ModMetaData.name: FF-Tranquilizer Arsenal
ModMetaData.author: Eviance
ModMetaData.description:
Have you ever wanted to knock out your enemies instead of killing them? Tired of not being able to get any new prisoners because your level 20 ranged pawn has a penchant for headshots? Then this is the mod for you, expanding on the original Tranquilizer Weapons this expansion adds over 10 brand new varied and interesting weapons, a new tier of tranqulizer weapons and oodles of tranquilizer fun to Rimworld for you to put your enemies the @#$% to sleep. Enjoy Tranquilizer Arsenal today.
-FreeFolk Modding
